mean_cn: v. 使抽搐，使震动，震惊
mean_en: to have an experience in which the muscles in your body shake in a sudden violent way that you are not able to control :to experience convulsions
word_etyma: con共同，全部+vuls拉扯+e→收缩到一起→抽搐 → 使抽搐，使剧烈震动
sentence: The patient convulsed before losing consciousness. Call the doctor!
sentence_trans: 病人开始抽搐起来，很快就失去了意识。快叫医生来！
